title: Straight lines, pegs and satellites
creator_credit: Stanley Dalby, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: Gives an overview of the varied work undertaken by surveyors, particularly the staff of the Australian Survey Office. Shows a range of work, from the measurement of dams, tunnels and towers to mapping of coastlines and reefs using the latest technology.
creator_credit_for_label: Stanley Dalby, Don Murray and Film Australia
